about_us.banner_description: TIMmunity GmbH promotes its enterprise-grade products by selling vouchers to vendors. Product Immunity, as a voucher selling system, allows the registered resellers to purchase and market these vouchers to its customers and get as much profit as they want.
about_us.content_description_1: With Product Immunity, we empower and help people make profits through vouchers trading. As a vendor, liaise with us, order vouchers for the TIMmunity products (Move Immunity, Transfer Immunity, AikQ, etc.)  of your choice and then sell them to your potential clients who can subscribe and use these products with reliability and affordability.
about_us.content_description_2: Your benefit lies in being a registered member of Product Immunity. The more you purchase and sell vouchers, the more opportunity instills in getting profits. Provide sound and yielding rationale to your customers to enjoy TIMmunity products like never before.
about_us.content_sub_title: Double-up your cash flow by purchasing our vouchers and selling them to your clients.
about_us.content_title: Harness the Power of Product Immunity!
about_us.form_description: Drop us a message for any info on how to partner with us.
about_us.join_handswithus_description: With Product Immunity, we empower and help people make money through vouchers trading. Our voucher ordering process is completely hassle free. You can have the vouchers in a large quantity, but you will be charged for the used ones only. You’ll receive the unique codes by email. Hurry up and maximize your earnings!
about_us.join_handswithus_title: Join Hands with Us to Earn Money Through Vouchers Trading!

features.banner_description: Transfer Immunity helps users to quickly transfer large files beyond standard limits with improved agility by installing this extension to Thunderbird and Outlook.
features.banner_title_1: A Scalable Solution To Manage File Transfer
features.banner_title_2: Of Any Type, Size And Complexity
features.content_title: Share Large Files and Use Short Links to Access Transferred Files from Anywhere
features.related_links_description_1: Take Control of Your Files Migration
features.related_links_description_2: Try SaaS-based Transfer Immunity for Quick Data Export

footer.voucher_selling_for_vendors_to_buy_and_s: A voucher selling system built for vendors to buy and sell vouchers aiming to encourage people to use TIMmunity products.

home.centralized_system_built_for_vendors: A centralized system built for vendors to buy and sell vouchers for different products offered by TIMmunity GmbH and earn handsome profits!
home.voucher_selling_system_to_boost_up: A voucher selling system to boost up TIMmunity products usage.
home.join_hands_with_timmunity_in_advertising: Join your hands with TIMmunity in advertising its products through vouchers and earn a handsome amount of money. Resellers can buy vouchers for different TIMmunity products and sell to their customers. It allows the end users to access and enjoy discounts and some premium services to be used for free.
home.great_for_businesses_to_enhance_consumer: Great for Businesses to Enhance Consumer Loyalty
